price: 25. (Ingatlah) ketika mereka masuk ke tempatnya lalu mengucapkan, "Salāman (salam)", Ibrahim menjawab, "Salāmun (salam)". (Mereka itu) orang-orang yang belum dikenal.
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: idh dakhalū ʿalayhi faqālū salāman qāla salāmun qawmun munkarūna
